help.title: Help
help.recommendedMethodDesc: Use the "Automatic key extraction" section above. Just log in via QR code and select the scale from the list - the key will be retrieved automatically.
help.macVsBleKeyDesc: MAC address can be detected automatically ("Search devices" button). BLE key requires retrieval from Xiaomi cloud (automatically or manually).
help.step1: Install Mi Home/Xiaomi Home app on your phone
help.step2: Pair the scale with the app (take one measurement)
help.step3: Use one of the external tools:
help.importantNote: To retrieve the key, you must have the scale paired with the Mi Home app and log in to your Xiaomi account.
